body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 3 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Fredericksburg & Spotsylvania National Military Park Rescheduled Date: “A Place for the Living and the Dead: Creation of the National Cemetery”      Time: 6:30 PM to 8:00 PM Location: Fredericksburg Battlefield Visitor Center, at 1013 Lafayette Boulevard, Fredericksburg, 22401. Fees: Free     Friday, August 19, 2016 The National Park Service has rescheduled the History at Sunset program rained out on July 1st. It will be added to the end of the schedule—it will be presented on Friday August 19, starting at 6:30. View Details      Fredericksburg & Spotsylvania National Military Park Solemnity, Grandeur, and Everyday People:  100 Years of National Parks      Time: 8:00 PM to 9:00 PM Location: Fredericksburg Battlefield Visitor Center at 1013 Lafayette Boulevard, Fredericksburg, 22401 Fees: Free     Saturday, August 20, 2016 The third and final program in our Battlefield Campfire Program series for the summer of 2016  View Details      Fredericksburg & Spotsylvania National Military Park NPS Centennial Open House      Location: Chatham Manor, 120 Chatham Ln, Fredericksburg, VA 22405 Fees: Free     Saturday, August 27, 2016 Join us for a Founders Weekend Day Centennial Open House, and a behind-the-scenes look at what we do and how we do it.
